I'm trying to make an object the player has from the beginning of the game till the end, a "notepad" , it should allow them to keep notes on anything they want to in-game as I am planning on implementing some features later in the game that would require knowledge gained earlier, is it possible to create such a thing? I'd like it so every time they open the notepad they see what they have already written, but they can continue to add to the pad until the game ends.

Thanks all.
